articles.title: Coventry and Warwickshire pubs are selling beer for 95p a pint pre-lockdown - Coventry Live
articles.description: The Stonegate Pub Company has announced a lockdown beer sale on all cask ale
articles.content:
A host of pubs in Coventry, Warwickshire and Solihull are selling pints of beer for less than £1 in the run-up to Englands month-long lockdown.
The lockdown beer sale has been announced by the Stone… [+3467 chars]
